protocol.name: P-GSE42060-1
protocol.text: ID_REF =  VALUE = MAS5.0 signal intensity ABS_CALL =

protocol.name: P-GSE42060-3
protocol.text: The sterilized Arabidopsis seeds were sown on Petri dishes containing a medium of 1/2 Murashige & Skoog (MS) basal salts with 1% sucrose, 0.1% MES (adjusted to pH 5.7 with 1 N NaOH), and 1.2% agar. After 2 days of stratification at 4℃, the agar plates were placed vertically in the growth room with a photoperiod of 16 h light : 8 h dark at 22–24℃.The light intensity was 100 µmol m-2 s-1. At day 8 after seed germination, whole seedlings were collected for RNA isolation.

protocol.name: P-GSE42060-4
protocol.text: Trizol extraction of total RNA was performed using RNA extraction kit (Cat#15596-018，Life technologies, Carlsbad, CA, US) according to the manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE42060-5
protocol.text: Total RNA was amplified, labeled, and purified with the GeneChip 3’IVT Express Kit (Cat#901229, Afftnetrix, Santa Clara, CA, US) following the manufacturer’s instructions to obtain biotin labeled cRNA.

protocol.name: P-GSE42060-6
protocol.text: Array hybridization and wash were performed using GeneChip® Hybridization, Wash and Stain Kit (Cat#900720, Affymetrix, Santa Clara, CA, US) in a Hybridization Oven 645 (Cat#00-0331-220V, Affymetrix, Santa Clara, CA, US) and Fluidics Station 450 (Cat#00-0079, Affymetrix, Santa Clara, CA US) following the manufacturer’s instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE42060-7
protocol.text: Hybridized slides were scanned by GeneChip©Scanner 3000 (Cat00-00212, Affimetrix, Santa Clara, CA US) and Command Console Software 3.1 (Affymetrix, Santa Clara, CA US) with default settings.

protocol.name: P-GSE42060-8
text: Raw data were normalized by the MAS 5.0 algorithm, Gene Spring Software 11.0 (Agilent technologies, Santa Clara, CA, US). Microarray data analysis was performed using the SBC Analysis system, which is available on the website:
. The username and password to access to this website are available upon request.
